title: Features
description: Made from 100% organic wool, offering superior warmth and breathability.

title: Fabric & Care
description: Hand wash in lukewarm water with a wool-safe detergent.
Lay flat to dry to maintain the garment's shape.
Avoid hanging to prevent stretching.
Use a wool conditioner occasionally to restore natural oils.
